welcome_message_body: Welcome to Depok, Indonesia! Known for its lush green landscapes, vibrant cultural scene, and delicious street food, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this city has to offer. Selamat datang!

restaurants.name: Bakmie Ko Amien
restaurants.description: Bakmie Ko Amien is a chinese restaurant located in Depok.
restaurants.address: Jl. Dewi Sartika, Depok, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Yatai Sushi & Snow Ice

restaurants.name: Bebek & Ayam Goreng Pak Ndut
